name: Bastion Events
guidance: After issuing Maintain, roll once on the Bastion Events table for that Bastion.
If multiple characters issue Maintain in the same turn, roll separately for each.
Events resolve immediately with the player and DM fleshing out details.
Events occur only when the Bastion is under Maintain, often when the owner is away.
Let players roleplay hirelings reacting to events; consider cutscenes.
